file.name: vendor_specific_payload.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: OpenApi Petstore
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.{host}.io/v1
    description: The production API server
paths:
  /pets:
    post:
      summary: Create a pet
      operationId: createPet
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/vnd.ms-excel:
            schema:
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Null response

Error: parse: parse spec: parse servers: at 1:399: path parameter not specified: "host"
